header.text: The place where you start earning more

section-2.title-2: Gathering Point for Arbitrators and SEO Professionals

card-1.title: Panel Discussions
card-1.text: Join and get insights from experts on the hottest topics in the world of SEO and affiliate marketing.

card-2.title: Exhibition Area
card-2.text: Among the event's sponsors and exhibitors are leading SEO companies and affiliate networks from trending niches, advertising platforms, services for SEO and arbitrage - everything you need to boost your profit.

card-3.title: 3000mÂ² for Networking
card-3.text: Connect with your crowd. We create the perfect conditions for networking. No info-biz, SMM. Only SEO, Arbitrage, and hardcore.

card-4.title: Sempro Afterparty
card-4.text: This is not just a themed party, it's a self-sufficient networking event. The best DJs, Go-Go girls, show ballets, contests, plus a space for meeting old friends.

section-6.title: Where SEMPRO CONFERENCE 2021 Will Take Place
section-6.text: The Kyiv International Conference Center is a modern and unique complex that combines innovation, style, and the reputation of the capital's best event venue. That's why SEMPRO is taking place here for the second year in a row.

section-7.title: Traditionally, the afterparty is a grand event that concludes SEMPRO CONFERENCE. Energetic dancing, rivers of alcohol, a packed show program. Let's see how cool it was at AFTERPARTY 2020

section-8.title: Registration for SEMPRO 2021
section-8.text-info: You can make the payment now or later (via the link sent to your email). Registration will allow you to reserve your ticket before the price increase.

card.text-1: PM Affiliates is the advertising partner program of the well-known bookmaker company Parimatch.
card.text-2: The partner program provides three of the most popular collaboration models: CPA, Revenue Share, and hybrid. They are also ready to consider each case individually and always meet their partners' needs.
card.text-3: PM Affiliates offers direct offers from the advertiser at the highest rate in the market, its own mobile iOS app, juicy promo materials for current events, and much more.
